project."},"returns":{"_0":"The project's creator address and an array of branch names."}},"initialize(address,bool)":{"details":"Ideally, avoid front-running this initialization function.","params":{"sablier":"The streaming contract responsible for creating linear streams."}},"requestFeatureFunding(bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"branchName":"The name of the branch where the feature will be developed and tracked.","duration":"The duration of developing the feature.","featureName":"The name of the feature to request funding for.","projectURL":"The Projects","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addProject(bytes)":{"notice":"Allows anyone to list their project on the FPG platform."},"fundFeature(bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Allows anyone to support a listed feature by contributing funds."},"getFeatureDetails(bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Retrieves detailed information about a specific feature within a project."},"getProjectDetails(bytes)":{"notice":"Retrieves detailed information about a project."},"getProjectURLs()":{"notice":"Retrieves the URLs of all projects listed on the platform."},"initialize(address,bool)":{"notice":"Initializes the contract with the provided streaming contract."},"requestFeatureFunding(bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Allows the owner of a project to request funding for a specific params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.

fundFeature(bytes,bytes,uint256).details: Callers must approve the implementing contract to spend the [amount] tokens before using this function.Funding is streamed to the project owner based on the specified amount.

params.amount: The amount of funding in tokens.
params.branchName: The branch name for the feature to fund.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.

params.branchName: The name of the branch containing the feature.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project.

returns._0: The feature's name, start date, duration, total funding amount, and current status.

params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project.

returns._0: The project's creator address and an array of branch names.

initialize(address,bool).details: Ideally, avoid front-running this initialization function.

params.sablier: The streaming contract responsible for creating linear streams.

params.branchName: The name of the branch where the feature will be developed and tracked.
params.duration: The duration of developing the feature.
params.featureName: The name of the feature to request funding for.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.
params.startDate: The start date for the feature development.

params.branchName: The name of the initial branch for the project.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.

params.branchName: The branch name for the feature to stop funding.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.

params.branchName: The branch name for the feature to update.
params.projectURL: The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.
params.status: The new status of the feature.

addProject(bytes).notice: Allows anyone to list their project on the FPG platform.

fundFeature(bytes,bytes,uint256).notice: Allows anyone to support a listed feature by contributing funds.

getFeatureDetails(bytes,bytes).notice: Retrieves detailed information about a specific feature within a project.

getProjectDetails(bytes).notice: Retrieves detailed information about a project.

getProjectURLs().notice: Retrieves the URLs of all projects listed on the platform.

initialize(address,bool).notice: Initializes the contract with the provided streaming contract.

requestFeatureFunding(bytes,bytes,bytes,.notice: Allows the owner of a project to request funding for a specific feature.

startProject(bytes,bytes).notice: Starts a new project by listing it on the FPG platform.

stopFundingFeature(bytes,bytes).notice: Allows contributors to stop funding a feature, refunding the remaining amount not yet streamed.

updateFeatureStatus(bytes,bytes,uint8).notice: Allows the project creator to update the status of a funded feature.

documentation.text:
@notice Allows anyone to list their project on the FPG platform.
 @param projectURL The GitHub/Gitlab URL of the project to be listed.
@notice Retrieves the URLs of all projects listed on the platform.
